flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It lives alongside clear ponds.
It scatters pollen that induces
harsh sneezing and runny noses.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Sensitive to changing temperature,
the bud is said to bloom when it
feels the sun’s warm touch.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
When it feels the sun’s warm touch,
it opens its bud to release pollen.
It lives alongside clear pools.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
When it feels the sun’s warm touch,
it opens its bud to release pollen.
It lives alongside clear pools.

Sensitive to changing temperature,

flavor_text_entries.white:
Sensitive to changing temperature,
the bud is said to bloom when it

flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Sensitive to changing temperatures,
the bud blooms when it’s warm,
releasing toxic pollen.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Sensitive to changing temperatures,
the bud blooms when it’s warm,
releasing toxic pollen.
flavor_text_entries.x:
When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud
to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the
cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud
to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the
cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
The pollen it releases contains poison. If this
Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s
toxicity is increased.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature
changes. When its bud starts to open, that means
spring is right around the corner.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
When the sun's light strengthens, the bud atop this Pokémon's
head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is
over, and the season of budding has begun.
